lead_paragraph: Midfielder John Obi Mikel wants interim manager Guus Hiddink to extend his stay at Chelsea beyond the current season, despite the Dutchman confirming his intention to leave the club in May.

headline.print_headline: Mikel Wants Hiddink to Reconsider Chelsea Exit
headline.main: Mikel Wants Hiddink to Reconsider Chelsea Exit

snippet: Midfielder John Obi Mikel wants interim manager Guus Hiddink to extend his stay at Chelsea beyond the current season, despite the Dutchman confirming his intention to leave the club in May....
